name: Skeet: VR Target Shooting
description: A VR target shooting simulator for the HTC Vive. Use one of three shotguns and shoot clay pigeons and other targets in Virtual Reality. Features Trap, Skeet, and Quickdraw modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A

reviews.review_text: Really, really fun. Not a whole lot in there but definitely worth the money.  EDIT: Woops, forgot it was free LOL
Very satisfying, not a lot of replay value but a good game to pull out at parties to showcase the Vive to friends.

not sure why there is such negetivity aroudn this demo, I mean it's free and it works pretty well for me. I think that maybe there could be more variation in the game modes or more features added but, .... did I mention that its free?   I prefer to be supportive of the dev, clearly a lot of time has been put out just to test a few concepts, and good ones at that. Thumbs up from me.
Could not get game to start from opening scene
It's okay, but I need more to keep me entertained. Check it out if you're a new Vive owner and can't afford games yet.
I'd like it more if it had some automatic weapons, but it's a lot of fun as is. Recommended!

Wow, what a great workout, the timed shooting is the best! I am sweating like crazy right now, could not stop playing until my sides started hurting from twisting around, reloading and firing. 1.63 seconds!!!! Woohooo!
Super fun. Already spent more time than i should have making the shotgun go clickity clack. Would love more guns.
